name: youtube-app-card
author: zxnb01
preview: A modern app store card component featuring YouTube app with logo, metrics, and decorative elements

props.name: appName
props.description: The name of the app to display

props.name: downloads
props.description: Number of downloads in readable format

props.name: isPaused
props.description: Whether the download/install is paused (affects button icon)

props.name: onActionClick
props.description: Callback function when the action button is clicked
